vlive.korean: [무이네 남쪽의 사막 같은 모래 언덕 풍광] 모래 언덕 같은 느낌? [Mui Ne's sand dunes] it feels like sand dunes. 듣기 View video 컨버전스 TV (CONS TV) : [W메이트 6화]모시고 오면 효녀 소리 듣는 북한산 맛집
vlive.english: [Mui Ne's sand dunes] it feels like sand dunes.

vlive.korean: 언덕 위에 뭐라고? What on top of the hill? 듣기 View video ASTRO : 연 날리기😆
vlive.english: What on top of the hill?

vlive.korean: [애드리브 파티] 오사카 '사카'는 언덕! [Ad-lib party] Osaka, "saka" is a hill! 듣기 View video SEVENTEEN : [SEVENTEEN] GOING SEVENTEEN 2019 EP.9 JAPAN 'HARU' CONCERT #2
"내 이름자 묻힌 언덕 위에도 자랑처럼 풀이 무성할 게외다." "On this hill where my name is buried o'er, Shall grasses heavily grow as if pride of mine busom." 듣기 View video Park Bo Young : 하이하이
vlive.english: "On this hill where my name is buried o'er, Shall grasses heavily grow as if pride of mine busom."

vlive.korean: [언덕 스케일 무엇?] 언덕을 판다고요? 언덕을 팔아요? [HILL?!] So it means selling hills?! Hills? 듣기 View video Big Picture (빅픽처) : 빅픽처 스페셜시즌 EP 27_광수 빠잇! 이젠 우리에겐 승리♥
vlive.english: [HILL?!] So it means selling hills?! Hills?

examples.korean: The hills were cloaked in thick mist. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 언덕들은 짙은 안개에 가려 있었다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The hills were cloaked in thick mist. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The procession made its way down the hill. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 행렬은 언덕 아래로 나아갔다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The procession made its way down the hill. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: They banked the earth (up) into a mound. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그들은 흙을 작은 언덕처럼 쌓아올렸다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: They banked the earth (up) into a mound. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The cart began its gradual ascent up the hill. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 카트가 언덕을 천천히 올라가기 시작했다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The cart began its gradual ascent up the hill. Add to Wordbook

examples.korean: The local rock is quarried from the hillside. 듣기 Add to Wordbook 그 언덕 중턱에서 이 지역의 암석을 캐내고 있다. Oxford Advanced Learner's English-Korean Dictionary
examples.english: The local rock is quarried from the hillside. Add to Wordbook
